website_summaries.verdict: A full-cut welding jacket with a cotton body and leather sleeves.
pros: Attractive with snaps and leather arms
Price is lower due to cotton-leather combination
cons: Some people find the stitching in the sleeves to be uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the sparks off.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I lnocked a star off is the "fuzzy leather" that shed on to the body of the shirt and looks like fido's butt, dang hard to get it off too. The leather is comfortable, it fits right and has held up well to my abuse. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sockwell

customer_reviews.title: Durable welding jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This Jacket runs small.. so if u wear a large get XL... My son is 5’9” 125 lbs & the XL is a perfect fit for him.
customer_reviews.author: MikeHunt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used this jacket in wedling school to for pretty much all types of welding. The jacket fits well and the lether sleeves held up well to stick welding spatter. Overall this jacket is best suited for flux core MIG or stick welding but probably too heavy for most standard MIG and definitely overkill for TIG
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket for a couple weeks until I tried to unsnap a button for the sleeve and the leather sleeve tore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the sizing info was very confusing (i thought 4x was the only size available when ordering)
customer_reviews.text: seems like a very nice jacket, time will tell on durability. but, so far, very nice protection, without the big price.
customer_reviews.author: M Y C

customer_reviews.title: A reasonably priced welding jacket. It fits me well ...
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced welding jacket. It fits me well even with a thick sweatshirt underneath that I wear when working outside in cold weather. I haven't had any issues with sparks or getting burnt when welding or grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Hooles

customer_reviews.title: Very good jacket..
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Fits great, keeps hot slag off my clothes. Haven't burned a hole in this thing yet.
customer_reviews.author: joedoe

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Very well made but runs small. My husband wear a M-L so we got a large to make sure it fit over his T shirt but was still a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Handy

customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Haven’t burned a hole in the sleeves yet. Light weight and great to weld in
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Steven vencill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a cheap but great quality welding jacket!
customer_reviews.author: McCleese reviews

customer_reviews.title: Probably not for the professional welder
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is getting holy and I have had it for a few months. I do use it everyday though
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well. Light-weight, yet protects me from welding sparks.
customer_reviews.author: Ray French

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be improved with heavier cotton front panels
customer_reviews.text: good sleeve construction, but the chest panels could be heavier cotton. Overall it's a good jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been in this thing for about a week and its holding up just fine. Its not as hot as I thought it would be. Sweat dries quickly and leather is easy on the arms.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jacket has a nice fit, dose not seem to get too hot and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: what a nice jacket. The fit is as expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what a nice jacket. The fit is as expected. The sleeves are slightly long so they still cover the arms when working with arms stretched out in front of the body.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Its protects him and looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this jacket for welding. Its protects him and looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I thought it might be too tight on the shoulders, but it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Jurewicz

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for hard work, and the jacket works great
customer_reviews.author: Jordan lopez

customer_reviews.title: Where did you get THAT gem?
customer_reviews.text: Welding instructor asked ,"Where did you get THAT gem?". Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nonalo

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, does not feel as durable ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, does not feel as durable as it should. That being said, it is lightweight and has not burned me yet.
customer_reviews.author: The Ghost of Simo Häyhä

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought and sent this to a friend and he is extremely pleased. Thanjs so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up great! Fit just how I expected. Great jacket for wire welding. Well worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are not lined and have a thick seam inside which makes it uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow shipping. Product was good
customer_reviews.text: The product was good but the shipping took almost 10 days longer than stated when ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, runs about a size bigger than listed
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little bit big, but it's a great jacket. I've used it close to ten times now, there is only one very minuscule hole from a big enough spark hitting it just right. Will buy another one in the future when mine finally wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Steiner 1260-L 30-Inch Jacket, Weldlite Plus Navy Cotton, Rust Cowhide Sleeves, Large
feature_bullets: Weldlite 9.5 ounce navy cotton plus rust split cowhide sleeves
Non-reflective snap front and wrist closure
